thread.title: FIAT CHRYSLER AUTOMOBILES N.V.: FCA to announce First Quarter 2018 financial results on April 26

author: cnbc.com
title: FIAT CHRYSLER AUTOMOBILES N.V.: FCA to announce First Quarter 2018 financial results on April 26
text:
Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V. ( "FCA" ) (NYSE: FCAU / MTA: FCA) announced today that its financial results for the first quarter of 2018 will be released on Thursday, April 26, 2018.
A live audio webcast and conference call of the 2018 Q1 results will begin at 1:00 p.m. BST / 2:00 p.m. CEST / 8:00 a.m. EDT on Thursday, April 26.
Details for accessing this presentation will be available in the Investors section of the Group's website at www.fcagroup.com prior to the event. For those unable to participate in the live session, a replay will remain archived on the corporate website ( www.fcagroup.com ) for two weeks after the call.
London, 23 March 2018
Attachment:
http://www.globenewswire.com/NewsRoom/AttachmentNg/cd88b5b0-ae58-40bc-bd2c-b78ae8b1b58f
Source: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles N.V.
